entropy.configuration

Interface VirtualMachine

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Cloneable, ManagedElement

    public interface VirtualMachine
extends ManagedElement, Cloneable
    Specify a Virtual Machine. Depending on its state, a virtual machine may consume some CPU and memory resources. It may require some different amount of CPU and memory resources to run at a peak level.
    Author:
    Fabien Hermenier

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addOption(String opt)
      Specify an option for the virtual machine.

      Add a valuated option.

      Check the presence of an option in the virtual machine specification.

      Deep copy of the virtual machine.

      Return the current CPU consumption of the virtual machine.
      int getCPUDemand()
      Get the amount of CPU resources the virtual machine need to run at a peak level.
      int getCPUMax()
      Get the maximum amount of CPU the VM is allowed to use.

      Get the identifier of the hosting platform for this virtual machine.

        int getCPUMax()
        Get the maximum amount of CPU the VM is allowed to use.
        Returns:
